oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-12-24 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 24, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performer George Morgan, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1107th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Archie Campbell; Hank Snow; George Morgan; Jordanaires; Stringbean
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Archie Campbell) -- We Wish You A Merry Christmas (Minnie Pearl, Archie Campbell) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Hank Snow) (recording) -- Hank Snow introduces George Morgan -- Silent Night (George Morgan, Jordanaires) -- Grant Turner introduces Stringbean -- Forgetting To Forget You (Stringbean) -- Grant Turner introduces Hank Snow -- Christmas Roses (Hank Snow) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hank Snow) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jordanaires (Musical group); Snow, Hank; Morgan, George, 1925-1975
